Key Match Events: Sean Williams scored a fine half century
Shakib Al Hasan took a crucial wicket to dismiss Sean Williams
Afif Hossain took a catch to dismiss Brad Evans
Shakib Al Hasan took a diving catch to dismiss Milton Shumba
Mustafizur Rahman took a comfortable catch to dismiss Wesley Madhevere
Taskin Ahmed took a crucial wicket to dismiss Sikandar Raza
Mustafizur Rahman took a diving catch to dismiss Regis Chakabva
Afif Hossain took a run out to dismiss Nurul Hasan
Afif Hossain hit a six to reach 17 runs in an over
Shanto and Shakib Al Hasan added 50 partnership runs
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh held their nerve and won the match by three runs
Zimbabwe showed character but could not chase down the target
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match had a thrilling last over finish
The third umpire gave a no ball which changed the course of the match
Bangladesh's Mustafizur Rahman and Taskin Ahmed bowled well to restrict Zimbabwe's batting
Sean Williams fought a lone battle for Zimbabwe
Bangladesh's new ball bowlers did the damage early on
